snippet: Normandy Invasion, a 12-1 shot at the Kentucky Derby, ran off with his exercise rider for three-eighths of a mile, but he appeared to be unhurt.
abstract: Normandy Invasion, a 12-1 shot at the Kentucky Derby, ran off with his exercise rider for three-eighths of a mile, but he appeared to be unhurt.

headline.main: Normandy Invasion Too Keen During Workout
